info.name: Appmenu-button with Firefox-Icon on Linux/Ubuntu
info.description:
Note: LINUX ONLY!


On Linux the appmenu-button is named appmenu-toolbar-button. Some other things are causing that the windows-codes to replace the appmenu-button don`t work on Linux. So i tried a little bit and here it is.

The code kills the dropmarker and buttontext and replaces it with a 16px-firefox-icon.
